title: Strengthening Employment Relationships and Organizational Learning Capabilities - Mobile Microlearning

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic organizational management principles
context.additional_context: Mobile learning content optimized for smartphone environments with real-time feedback via formative assessments

learning_goals: Learners can explain the relationship between types of employment relationships (e.g., reciprocal investment model) and functional flexibility.
Learners can distinguish the characteristics and application cases of organizational learning types (exploratory vs. exploitative learning).
Learners can analyze the impact of reciprocal investment-based employment relationships on organizational learning outcomes.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
